languages.text: {n}Паразит выглядит намертво приросшим к голове жертвы... на первый взгляд. Вы прослеживаете закономерность в расположении щупалец на голове жертвы. Если сделать несколько аккуратных надрезов здесь... и там... пожалуй, можно попытаться отделить существо от головы несчастного.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы прослеживаете закономерность в расположении щупалец паразита. Тонкие, похожие на кнуты, они срослись с мозгом и нервной системой несчастного. Однако, если сделать несколько аккуратных надрезов здесь... и там... Пожалуй, можно попытаться отделить существо от тела. Возможно, никто даже не умрет.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The parasite appears to be tightly and permanently attached to the victim's head... or so it seems. You spot a certain pattern in the location of the tendrils on the host's body. Making a few incisions here... and there... would probably allow you to separate the creature from its unfortunate bearer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Паразит выглядит намертво приросшим к голове жертвы... на первый взгляд. Вы прослеживаете закономерность в расположении щупалец на голове жертвы. Если сделать несколько аккуратных надрезов здесь... и там... пожалуй, можно попытаться отделить существо от головы несчастного.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The parasite looks tightly and permanently attached to the victim's head... Or so it seems. You spot a certain pattern in the location of tendrils on the host's body. Making a few incisions here... and there... would probably let you separate the creature from its unfortunate bearer.{/n}

Making a few incisions here... and there... would probably allow you to separate the creature from its unfortunate bearer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那只寄生生物似乎紧紧地缠绕在受害者头上，看起来似乎永远都无法分开……或者说，只是看起来无法分开而已。你发现附着在宿主身上的触须位置，似乎存在着某种规律。只要在这里切几个切口……在那里再切几个切口……说不定就可以把这只生物与不幸的宿主分开。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The parasite appears to be tightly and permanently attached to the victim's head... or so it seems. You spot a certain pattern in the location of the tendrils on the host's body. Making a few incisions here... and there... would probably allow you to separate the creature from its unfortunate bearer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那只寄生生物似乎紧紧地缠绕在受害者头上，看起来似乎永远都无法分开……或者说，只是看起来无法分开而已。你发现附着在宿主身上的触须位置，似乎存在着某种规律。只要在这里切几个切口……在那里再切几个切口……说不定就可以把这只生物与不幸的宿主分开。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El parásito parece estar acoplado permanentemente a la cabeza de la víctima... pero tal vez no. Ves cierta pauta en el posicionamiento de los zarcillos en el cuerpo del anfitrión. Con unos cortes aquí... y ahí... probablemente puedas separar a la criatura de su desgraciado portador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The parasite appears to be tightly and permanently attached to the victim's head... or so it seems. You spot a certain pattern in the location of the tendrils on the host's body. Making a few incisions here... and there... would probably allow you to separate the creature from its unfortunate bearer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El parásito parece estar acoplado permanentemente a la cabeza de la víctima... pero tal vez no. Ves cierta pauta en el posicionamiento de los zarcillos en el cuerpo del anfitrión. Con unos cortes aquí... y ahí... probablemente puedas separar a la criatura de su desgraciado portador.{/n}

languages.text: {n}寄生体は男の頭に離れまいとしっかり張り付いている…それともそう見えるだけか。宿主の体に絡みつく場所にあるパターンがあるではないか。あっちと…こっち…何箇所か切れ込みを入れれば、あの生き物を不幸な宿主から引き離せるかもしれない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The parasite appears to be tightly and permanently attached to the victim's head... or so it seems. You spot a certain pattern in the location of the tendrils on the host's body. Making a few incisions here... and there... would probably allow you to separate the creature from its unfortunate bearer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}寄生体は男の頭に離れまいとしっかり張り付いている…それともそう見えるだけか。宿主の体に絡みつく場所にあるパターンがあるではないか。あっちと…こっち…何箇所か切れ込みを入れれば、あの生き物を不幸な宿主から引き離せるかもしれない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Parasit scheint fest und dauerhaft am Kopf des Opfers zu hängen ... zumindest sieht es so aus. Du entdeckst ein bestimmtes Muster in der Positionierung der Ranken am Körper des Wirts. Ein paar Einschnitte hier ... und da ... würden es dir wahrscheinlich ermöglichen, die Kreatur von ihrem unglückseligen Träger zu lösen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The parasite appears to be tightly and permanently attached to the victim's head... or so it seems. You spot a certain pattern in the location of the tendrils on the host's body. Making a few incisions here... and there... would probably allow you to separate the creature from its unfortunate bearer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Parasit scheint fest und dauerhaft am Kopf des Opfers zu hängen ... zumindest sieht es so aus. Du entdeckst ein bestimmtes Muster in der Positionierung der Ranken am Körper des Wirts. Ein paar Einschnitte hier ... und da ... würden es dir wahrscheinlich ermöglichen, die Kreatur von ihrem unglückseligen Träger zu lösen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le parasite semble irrémédiablement soudé à la tête de sa victime... à première vue, du moins. À y regarder de plus près, vous remarquez une certaine régularité dans la répartition des tentacules sur le corps de son hôte. En pratiquant quelques incisions ici... et là... vous parviendrez sans doute à délivrer ce malheureux de cette horreur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The parasite appears to be tightly and permanently attached to the victim's head... or so it seems. You spot a certain pattern in the location of the tendrils on the host's body. Making a few incisions here... and there... would probably allow you to separate the creature from its unfortunate bearer.{/n}

En pratiquant quelques incisions ici... et là... vous parviendrez sans doute à délivrer ce malheureux de cette horreur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parazit, kurbanının kafasına sıkıca ve kalıcı olarak yapışmış gibi duruyor. Konağın bedenine yapışan filizlerde bir örüntü olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Şuradan buradan birkaç kesik açarak yaratığı zavallı taşıyıcısından ayırabilirsin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The parasite appears to be tightly and permanently attached to the victim's head... or so it seems. You spot a certain pattern in the location of the tendrils on the host's body. Making a few incisions here... and there... would probably allow you to separate the creature from its unfortunate bearer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Parazit, kurbanının kafasına sıkıca ve kalıcı olarak yapışmış gibi duruyor. Ya da öyle gözüküyor. Konağın bedenine yapışan filizlerde bir örüntünün farkına varıyorsun. Şurada ve burada birkaç kesik açarak yaratığı zavallı taşıyıcısından ayırabilirsin.{/n}
